title: WANTED: Walter Johnson "Portrait" - El Principe De Gales
author: DerekMichael

posts.post_title: WANTED: Walter Johnson "Portrait" - El Principe De Gales
posts.post_content:
Greetings fellow net54 enthusiasts.

I am currently very keen to acquire an example of the Walter Johnson "Portrait" with an El Principe De Gales advertising reverse.

I am not interested in the technical grade so much as an example which is pleasing to the eye. The only thing which I would not have interest in discussing would be a "beater", and it is likely that a highly graded piece would be far too good for the likes of me.

Cash is a possibility, but I am also very interested in discussing trade, as I have an assortment of pieces available, including several Hall of Fame subject and advertising reverses including Lenox, Hindu, and American Beauty.

If you feel you may have a match and wish to discuss a possible deal, please feel free to PM me and I can present you with a trade list.

Thank you very much for your time.

Derek
